item.description: About Me I am a passionate Deep Learning Engineer and Technical Leader, specializing in: Machine Learning: Building and deploying state-of-the-art models for diverse applications. Computer Vision: Driving advancements in image processing, especially in real-time systems. Software Engineering: Designing scalable, reliable and efficient software systems.
